mapper.sql: ID, AUTH_APPLY_NO, AUTH_STATUS, ID_NO, NAME, EN_NAME, SEX, BIRTHDAY, ADDRESS, CERT_START_DATE, CERT_EXPIRY_DATE, CREATE_AT, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_AT, UPDATE_BY
mapper.insert: insert into T_AUTH_ID_LOG ( AUTH_APPLY_NO, AUTH_REQ_NO, AUTH_STATUS, ID_NO, NAME, EN_NAME, SEX, BIRTHDAY, ADDRESS, CERT_START_DATE, CERT_EXPIRY_DATE, CREATE_AT, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_AT, UPDATE_BY ) values ( #{authApplyNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{authReqNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{authStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certStartDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{certExpiryDate,jdbcType=DATE}, NOW(), #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(), #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
